name: rattled

effect.sword-shield: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.

short_effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.

flavor_text.sword-shield: Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
